FuncDef: This command defines a destination in a redirect policy. More than one destination can be configured. Whether a destination IPv4/IPv6 address will receive redirected packets depends on the effective priority value after evaluation.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IPv4 address (in dotted decimal notation) or IPv6 address to send the redirected traffic to. Values-IPv4 address:         ip-address: a.b.c.d.
